review: I love amazon, I however am not a fan of this product at all. We have two Apple TVs plus the Fire TV Stick on each one of our TVs, and the Fire stick by far functions the worst out of all of them. With our Apple TVs, we never have connectivity issues. We can run our laptops, cell phones and an Apple TV all at the same time with no disruption in connection whatsoever. And we have Century Link internet, which isn't the best, but it stays connected with all we like to do. With the Fire Stick, it seems like every single program or app is always loading or buffering, and this is with NO other devices in the house running. It cannot go 2 minutes without the program stopping to load. I know this is not a problem with our internet because of the fact we have no issues with our Apple TVs or Laptops doing the SAME EXACT streaming (such as Netflix or Hulu). I usually don't write reviews on anything but this product has definitely been a disappointment. It is cheaper, yes, and I do like that it is essentially cordless when connected to our TV, unlike the Apple TV, but I was expecting a better functioning product since it has the Amazon name on it. I will likely be buying another Apple TV to replace this.
